com.bigdata.journal

Interface IGISTLocalManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGISTManager
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBTreeManager, IHAJournal, IJournal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJournal, Journal, JournalDelegate, StoreManager.ManagedJournal, TemporaryStore

    public interface IGISTLocalManager
extends IGISTManager
    Interface for managing local (non-distributed) generalized search trees (GiST).
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    GIST

    • Method Detail

      • register

        ICheckpointProtocol register(String name,
                           IndexMetadata metadata)
        Method creates and registers a named persistence capable data structure.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the index.
        metadata - The metadata that describes the data structure to be created.
        Returns:
        The persistence capable data structure.
        See Also:
        IGISTManager.registerIndex(IndexMetadata), Checkpoint.create(IRawStore, IndexMetadata)

      • getUnisolatedIndex

        ICheckpointProtocol getUnisolatedIndex(String name)
        Return the mutable view of the named persistence capable data structure (aka the "live" or ITx.UNISOLATED view).

        Note: IIndexManager#getIndex(String) delegates to this method and then casts the result to an IIndex. This is the core implementation to access an existing named index.

        Returns:
        The mutable view of the persistence capable data structure.
        See Also:
        IIndexManager#getIndex(String), GIST

      • getIndexLocal

        ICheckpointProtocol getIndexLocal(String name,
                                long commitTime)
        Core implementation for access to historical index views.

        Note: Transactions should pass in the timestamp against which they are reading rather than the transaction identifier (aka startTime). By providing the timestamp of the commit point, the transaction will hit the index cache on the journal. If the transaction passes the startTime instead, then all startTimes will be different and the cache will be defeated.

        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If you pass in ITx.UNISOLATED, ITx.READ_COMMITTED, or a timestamp that corresponds to a read-write transaction since those are not "commit times".
        See Also:
        IIndexStore#getIndex(String, long), Add cache for access to historical index views on the Journal by name and commitTime. , GIST FIXME GIST : Reconcile with {@link IResourceManager#getIndex(String, long)}. They are returning types that do not overlap ({@link ICheckpointProtocol} and {@link ILocalBTreeView}). This is blocking the support of GIST in {@link AbstractTask}.
